column5: Santa Fe /Mexican Hacienda style-Sleeps up to 9 in 3BR-3 Queen,2 Twin,1 sofa.  2 beautiful tile baths-large showers, handmade Mexican sinks & tilework, full stainless kitchen w/dishwasher, Smart TV, Wi-Fi, handmade furniture, special collections & artwork. Saltillo floors, handmade furniture & rugs, pottery, serape collection. All new mattresses/bedding & plenty of fluffy towels in a very private 1600+ sq. foot . 10' tiled bar w/bar chairs for enjoying local wine. Cookware, dishes& wine glasses.
